channel.title: runMoperscape-linux.sh
channel.description: Hey guys i heard about this and am really desperate to play but when i got the folder i looked and i dunno what to run the .sh file with :confused:, i asked someone and they said i can't run the .sh file while on a windows xp operating system is this true? if not then can someone PLEASE help me get this working, i would be MUCH appreciated! Thanks in advance, Levy!

item.description:

yeah got it thanks though :D, my only other problem now is in the item id i cant see the codes for the items so i was doing like ::pickup 7 5 for like 5 cannon bases (7 is the model type) but its not working.
